about.title: About me
about.description: I have 1.6 years of experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ReactJS, Next.js, Git, GitHub, and more. I love studying and learning things, thanks to my curiosity and experience in problem-solving.

quackity-studios.description: I developed an internal dashboard for administration and management of social media accounts, using technologies such as React, Vite, React Router Dom, and TypeScript. Additionally, I played an important role as one of the main developers of the QSMP landing page, employing Next.js with server components, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript for server-side content rendering.

encapse-arquitetura.description: I developed the application using React, Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form with Zod, and implemented features to send emails to client and process data, integrating with the company's database.

galorys.description: I developed interactive and responsive UIs using React, Styled Components, and TypeScript, providing a modern and adaptable visual experience. Integrated APIs into the backend for seamless communication between the interface and system functionalities, ensuring effective interaction.

shield-ethical.description: My goal was to develop an interactive and responsive landing page with a focus on user experience, following the principles of pixel perfect to a high standard. I used HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to develop a dashboard with a modern and adaptable design.

hide-pagamentos.description: I developed a landing page that aims to optimize the user experience, with a focus on pixel perfect design and a modern and adaptable design. Using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, I developed a responsive and interactive landing page.

galorys-gta.description: I developed a landing page for a GTA 5 Role Play website. I designed the concept in Figma. Technologies used: React, Styled Components, and TypeScript.

uninassau.title: Uninassau - Distance Learning
uninassau.description: I have currently paused my graduation in Systems Analysis and Development at Uninassau. Although I already have prior knowledge, I recognize the importance of the course for improving my programming skills.

high-school.title: High School
high-school.description: I have completed high school in 2019. I have obtained a high school diploma, which is a commendation for my academic achievements.
